text: Ceratozamia fuscoviridis is a species of plant in the family Zamiaceae. It is endemic to Hidalgo state in Mexico. It is a Critically endangered species, threatened by habitat loss. ==References== *Osborne R, Stevenson DWM, Vovides AP What is Ceratozamia fuscoviridis ? Delpinoa 2006; 48: 5-10 fuscoviridis Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Flora of Hidalgo (state) Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Critically endangered biota of Mexico Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ceratozamia fuscoviridis
